title: The Callisto Protocol Review
description:
The Callisto Protocol vs Dead Space match has come and gone and all I have left is this review and hardcore mode. Also PUBG is pretty important somehow. 
Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/mandaloregaming
Art by @sneksucks with animation and sound design by @SteakBentley 
I take video suggestions at mandaloremovies@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lord_Mandalore
